message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're starting high, I'll meet you in the middle
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more
I'm willing to make a concession, but I think I deserve a bit more
You're getting close to the edge, don't push me to the wall
I'm making one last attempt to find a compromise
You're running out of time, take it or leave it
I'm making a last-ditch effort to find a compromise
It's almost all mine, don't make me take it
I'll take what's left, but I'm not going down without a fight
It's now or never, take what's left
